workshoptitle: Build Intelligent Content Applications at cloud speed with Oracle WebCenter & Oracle APEX - Along with IDCS Integration

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: This lab provides detailed guide to Build Intelligent Content Applications at cloud speed with Oracle WebCenter & Oracle APEX - Along with IDCS Integration

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Prepare Setup
tutorials.description: How to download your ORM stack and update security rules for an existing VCN

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Setup WCC Marketplace Environment With IDCS Enabled
tutorials.description: How to provision the workshop environment with IDCS enabled and connect to it

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Initialize WCC Environment
tutorials.description: This lab provides detailed guide to initialize the workshop environment

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Setup APEX Application
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to create new workspace and import WCC RFP Management System APEX Application

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Config APEX Application with SSO/IDCS
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to Config WCC RFP Management System APEX Application with SSO

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Create New RFP Document
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to access the WCC RFP Management System APEX Application and go through the flow to create New RFP Document

tutorials.title: Lab 7: Update and Complete Documents for Sections Assigned to Individual User(s)
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to Preview, Download , Update the Section Document and Complete the Sections , assigned to the individual users , so that it can be merged to create a RFP Response Document.

tutorials.title: Lab 8: Merge Section Documents to Create RFP Response
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to select all the completed Section documents for a particular RFP and create a RFP Response Document.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
